title: STAT+: NIH redefines ‘clinical trials,’ dividing researchers
description: In a long-debated move, the NIH will no longer characterize basic experimental studies involving humans as clinical trials.
content: In a long-debated move, the NIH will no longer characterize basic experimental studies involving humans as clinical trials.
